.. |targetRNA|  replace:: 25S rRNA
.. |target| replace:: :raw-html:`<span class="mononorm">(gtctt)aaac<a href="../18s-tab.html#u18_25S" title="25S target">A</a>cggaccaagg</span>`
.. |ortholog| replace:: :raw-html:`yeast <a href="http://snoopy.med.miyazaki-u.ac.jp/snorna_db.cgi?mode=sno_info&amp;id=Saccharomyces_cerevisiae300067">U18</a>, human <a href="http://snoopy.med.miyazaki-u.ac.jp/snorna_db.cgi?mode=sno_info&id=Homo_sapiens300524">SNORD18A</a>`


U18-SNORD18
===========

.. figure:: /../_static/images/snoRNAs/u18_h99_igb.png
   :name: u18_h99_igb
   :align: left
   :width: 1389 px
   :height: 646 px
   :scale: 40%
   :figwidth: 100%


- U18-SNORD18_intronic-boxCDsnoRNA
- Within 1\ :sup:`st` intron of CNC03420 (CNAG_02714) mRNA for elongation factor 1-beta_EF1-beta
- Predicted target in |targetRNA|\ : |target|
- Orthologue of |ortholog|
- In yeast, modification was supported by the accessory guide while the *A* at the 5' end of the C' box and the *G* insertion in the D' box played a role in multiple modification [van.Nues-2016_], not seen in human nor expected for *Cryptococcus*.

.. figure:: /../_static/images/snoRNAs/u18-aligned.png
   :name: u18-align
   :align: left
   :width: 1362 px
   :height: 268 px
   :scale: 40%
   :figwidth: 100%
